T +33 1 47 95 97 12   F +33 1 47 95 24 56

E joe.nasr@nascofrance.com <mailto:joe.nasr@nascofrance.com> 

A member of the Nasco Insurance Group

Vos  emails adressés en dehors de la journée de travail n’appellent pas à être lus dans l’immédiat

 

This quote is subject to sanctions screening and the clearance by Nasco that there are no sanctions against any party that is covered under this risk and any party related thereto that has an interest in such risk*.

If any sanctions matches are identified then this quote is void and, regardless of whether such quote has been accepted or not, Nasco will not be bound to offer or agree to enter into any contract.

This sanction disclaimer applies not only if a party is itself sanctioned but also in respect of the inability to pay for any direct or indirect sanction. 

 

*and in respect of marine cargo cover, this is subject to ensuring the cargo is not subject to an export control restriction from the country of export to the destination country or to the receiving party and, ensuring the act of carrying the cargo will not in itself trigger a risk of being subject to sanctions.

 

 

De : Pierre-Antoine Bollet <p-a.bollet@christofle.com> 
Envoyé : mercredi 8 janvier 2025 22:58
À : Jay Davis <Jay.Davis@epicbrokers.com>
Cc : Joe Nasr <joe.nasr@nascofrance.com>; Sabrina Greenman <Sabrina.Greenman@epicbrokers.com>; Jennifer Cortez <Jennifer.Cortez@epicbrokers.com>
Objet : Re: [External] - RE: Second Request to Submit Renewal Information for Certificate of Insurance

Noted, thank you

 

PA

It is required you carry the following minimum coverages:

General Liability

 

Additional Insured

must be indicated in the description of ops or checked

 

Waiver of Subrogation

must be indicated in the description of ops or checked

 

Each Occurrence

a coverage level minimum of $5,000,000

Business Personal Property (Content)

 

Proof of coverage

must be provided

Primary & Non-Contributory

 

Proof of endorsement must be indicated in the description of ops

must be indicated

The certificate Insured Name should include the name of Tenant as stated on the Lease. 

Additional Insured(s) for this property are as follows:
Fuller Madison LLC, Vornado Office Management LLC, its managing agent, any ground lessor, Vornado Realty Trust, Vornado Realty L.P. and their partially controlled subsidiaries, divisions, affiliates, and/or joint ventures, and their owners, each lessor, each mortgagee and their respective partners, members, affiliates, subsidiaries, trustees, officers, employees and their successors and assigns as their interest may appear (ATIMA) are hereby added as Additional Insureds on a primary and non-contributory basis with respect to the General Liability coverage as required by written contract.The policy for general liability includes a waiver of subrogation. Lease is the governing document for all insurance requirements - terms, as noted, are for guidance only.

Lease is the governing document for all insurance requirements - terms, as noted, are for guidance only. Waiver of Sub as respects CGL, WC and Property Denoted as Additional Insured on all coverage, where applicable.

The certificate holder is as follows:

Vornado Realty Trust
as Agent for Fuller Madison LLC
210 Route 4 East
Paramus, NJ 07652
Attn: Risk Management

As previously communicated to you, your current certificate of insurance will expire soon.  To avoid being in default of your lease, please arrange for your insurance company, broker, or agent to provide us with a current certificate of insurance, Acord Form 25 for liability and worker's compensation and a copy of the Additional Insured endorsement.  The coverage must be in compliance with your lease requirements. Please review your lease to assure you have sufficient coverage and are not in default of your lease. If you have any issues, please contact your local building management team or Risk Management, with a copy of this email, at JeSmith@VNO.com <mailto:JeSmith@VNO.com> .

We appreciate your prompt response to this matter.

Sincerely,

Vornado Risk Management

225307
